info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:46PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Davie County through 800 PM EST... At 746 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Mocksville, or 4 miles southeast of Courtney, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bermuda Run, Farmington and Sheffield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
